pullrequest.title: Error reporting on missing sdf XML tags or version attribute

content.raw: I made some [changes](#!/osrf/sdformat/commits/847d8cb85eb9ea623908b79d1afd881adf3b284b) in the `malformed_sdf_sdf4_ian` branch to avoid reusing the arg variable `_modelXML`. Its was a little confusing because it was hard to tell which xml it was referring to in different parts of the code. Take a look and see if that makes sense.
content.html: I made some changes in the malformed_sdf_sdf4_ian branch to avoid reusing the arg variable _modelXML. Its was a little confusing because it was hard to tell which xml it was referring to in different parts of the code. Take a look and see if that makes sense.
